data.title: BanknoteNews – Breaking news about world paper money. Powered by The Banknote Book.
data.text:
Armenia new sig/date (2024) 10,000-dram note (B322b) reported introduced 15.08.2024

2024-08-16

Like B322a, but new signatures (Galstyan/Hovhannisyan), new date (2024), 10000 on back in purple-to-green OVI, and UV improvements front/back. Courtesy of Alex Zlotin and Nune Teryan (Central Bank of Armenia).Read More…

Armenia new sig/date (2024) 5,000-dram note (B321b) reported introduced 15.08.2024

2024-08-16

Like B321a, but new signatures (Galstyan/Hovhannisyan), new date (2024), 5000 on back in green-to-blue OVI, and UV improvements front/back. Courtesy of Alex Zlotin and Nune Teryan (Central Bank of Armenia).Read More…

Guyana enhanced security 1,000-dollar note (B124a) reported for introduction on 29.07.2024

2024-08-12

The 500- and 1,000-dollar notes are like the preceding issues, but with new security features. On the 500-dollar note, the holographic stripe has been replaced by a 10-mm wide magenta-to-green Rolling Star Lead Pure security foil with micro mirror featuring a macaw. On the 1,000-dollar note, the RAPID security threadRead More…

Ukraine new 500-hryvnia commemorative note (B870a) confirmed

2024-08-12

These notes commemorate the 33rd anniversary of Ukraine’s independence. They are like the preceding issues, but with the slogan of modern Ukraine—СЛАВА УКРАЇНІ! ГЕРОЯМ СЛАВА! (Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!)—added at upper right back. B870 (PNL): 500 гривень (hryven) (US$19)Beige, brown, green, blue, and pink. Front: Ukrainian text;Read More…

Ukraine new 1,000-hryvnia commemorative note (B871a) confirmed

2024-08-12

These notes commemorate the 33rd anniversary of Ukraine’s independence. They are like the preceding issues, but with the slogan of modern Ukraine—СЛАВА УКРАЇНІ! ГЕРОЯМ СЛАВА! (Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the heroes!)—added at upper right back. B871 (PNL): 1,000 гривень (hryven) (US$38)Blue. Front: Ukrainian text; denomination as registration device; VolodymyrRead More…

Guyana enhanced security 500-dollar note (B123a) reported for introduction on 29.07.2024

2024-08-12

The 500- and 1,000-dollar notes are like the preceding issues, but with new security features. On the 500-dollar note, the holographic stripe has been replaced by a 10-mm wide magenta-to-green Rolling Star Lead Pure security foil with micro mirror featuring a macaw. On the 1,000-dollar note, the RAPID security threadRead More…

Morocco new 50-dirham note (B521a) reportedly introduced on 30.07.2024

2024-08-12

B521 (PNL): 50 dirhams (US$5.25) Green. Front: Arabic text; two 5-pointed stars; denomination in OVI; Ouzoud Falls; architectural design inspired by Moroccan doors; King Mohammed VI; Moroccan coat of arms; denomination as registration device; two 5-pointed stars. Back: French text; denomination as registration device; saffron flowers; wind turbines; solar stationRead More…

Poland new 20-złoty commemorative note (BNP828a) confirmed introduced on 24.07.2024

2024-08-12

To commemorate the 80th anniversary of the Warsaw Uprising, the National Bank of Poland sold new 20-złoty notes packaged in a folder for 140 złotych each beginning on 26 July 2024. BNP828 (PNL): 20 złotych (US$5) Blue, brown, orange, and green. Front: Polish text; two insurgents crouching on barricade, watchingRead More…

Kenya revised 50- to 1,000-shilling notes (B144b – B148b) reported for introduction in 2024

2024-08-12

On 6 August 2024, the Central Bank of Kenya announced that all notes would be revised with new dates, signatures, and color-shifting security threads specific to each denomination. The 1,000-shilling note is to be issued first, with other denominations following in the coming months as the bank exhausts its supply ofRead More…

Mozambique new 200-metical note (B243a) confirmed

2024-08-11

B243 (PNL): 200 meticais (US$2.80) Blue. Front: Portuguese text; lion in green SPARK; tree; lion as registration device; bank logo; Samora Moisés Machel. Back: Portuguese text; stick figures; reclining lioness with cubs and standing lion; lion as registration device; outline map of Mozambique; quill; stick figures. Windowed security thread withRead More…
